mapper.select: SELECT INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE , INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_INTERRELATED WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY INTERRELATED_NM
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_CO_USER A INNER JOIN T_CO_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE

SELECT A.USER_NAME , A.USER_ID , A.USER_POSITION , A.DEPT_NAME , A.USER_TEL , A.USER_HP , A.USER_AUTH , A.USE_YN , B.INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_USER A INNER JOIN T_CO_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE
ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT ${offset}, ${pageSize}

SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_NAME , A.USER_POSITION , A.DEPT_NAME , A.USER_TEL , A.USER_HP , A.USER_AUTH , A.USE_YN , A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE , IFNULL(A.OPENAUTH, '') AS OPENAUTH , IFNULL(A.BIDAUTH, '') AS BIDAUTH , A.USER_EMAIL , DATE_FORMAT(A.PWD_EDIT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PWD_EDIT_DATE_STR , B.INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_USER A INNER JOIN T_CO_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE , INTERRELATED_NM FROM T_CO_INTERRELATED A INNER JOIN T_CO_USER_INTERRELATED B ON A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE = B.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY A.INTERRELATED_CUST_CODE
/* user.selectTCoCustUserDetail */ SELECT USER_NAME , USER_ID , USER_BUSEO , USER_POSITION , USER_EMAIL , USER_TEL , USER_HP , USER_TYPE , USE_YN FROM T_CO_CUST_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
